item.title: Data Science In 5 Links
item.description: Bayesian Statistics Statistical Rethinking Towards a Principled Bayesian Workflow brms R Package Stan User’s Guide Bayesian Data Analysis Textbook Open Data Open Corporates Open Data Handbook openaq: Open Air Quality EU Open Data Portal Copernicus Open Remote Sensing Data Data Science Team Management How to Decide which Data Science Projects to Pursue Data Science Team Management Basics Policy Entrepreneurship at the White House Productionizing Machine Learning: Pipelines scikit-learn pandas sklearn-pandas lightgbm Shap: Model Explanations

I am the Data Science Team Lead at N26. Over five years in data Iâ€™ve optimized digital marketing, applied machine learning to the contemporary art world, built an award winning project in an open data hackathon, and taken on a series of positions at a rather ambitious Berliner fintech. At the present, I am working on: building and mentoring data science teams scaling and managing product-driven ML and data science services developing best practices for data science in a product-driven organization If we have common interests, please get in touch: hello@jeremiahlewis.
